Articles.Content:
Whenever I launch the game, random graphics settings will be selected, there's always more than setting selected for the same option.

I set my PC setting to low but the next time I played both medium and high settings were selected with a random jumble of all the other settings.
I saw the same thing. I think it is a graphics glitch. Mouse-over the selections (without clicking anything) and they will highlight and then return to normal with only one showing as selected.
I'm in Fullscreen and windowed mode at the same time. Something is wrong but it doesn't make the game unplayable for me. I'd call it a cosmetic bug...
